complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: This task already has a good breakdown into 5 subtasks covering the data structure, selection UI, form creation, display component, and editing functionality. No further breakdown needed.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a complex task involving data modeling, UI components, form validation, persistence, and state management. The existing 5 subtasks provide a comprehensive breakdown that covers all aspects of the traveler management system.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Hotel Request Form implementation into subtasks covering: 1) Basic form structure and field creation, 2) Date picker implementation with validation logic, 3) Field validation and error handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This form has moderate complexity with date validation, conditional fields, and tooltips. Breaking it into 3 subtasks would help organize the work around form structure, date handling, and validation logic.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Flight Request Form implementation into subtasks covering: 1) Basic form structure and field creation, 2) Trip type conditional logic implementation, 3) Date picker implementation with validation, 4) Rental car section conditional display
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This form has higher complexity than the hotel form due to multiple conditional displays (return date based on trip type and rental car section). It requires more complex validation and state management.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Rental Car Request Form implementation into subtasks covering: 1) Basic form structure and field creation, 2) Date and time picker implementation, 3) Date/time validation logic and error handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This form has moderate complexity with date/time validation. The main challenges are implementing proper time inputs and ensuring the drop-off date/time is after pickup date/time.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Form Reset and Data Management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Form Reset and Data Management task into subtasks covering: 1) Clear form functionality with confirmation dialog, 2) Form data persistence during tab switching, 3) Form validation service implementation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves state management across multiple forms and requires careful handling of user data. The confirmation dialog and tab-switching persistence add complexity to what might otherwise be simple form operations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Summary Output Generation task into subtasks covering: 1) Data collection and formatting service, 2) Summary display component with styling, 3) Clipboard functionality implementation, 4) Base64 encoding and security measures
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires collecting data from multiple sources, formatting it properly, implementing clipboard functionality, and handling security concerns. The Base64 encoding and XSS protection add technical complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the URL-Based Data Sharing task into subtasks covering: 1) Data encoding and URL generation service, 2) Share link button functionality, 3) View page implementation for data display, 4) Error handling and security measures
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex data encoding/decoding, URL parameter handling, and creating a separate view page. Security considerations and error handling for invalid data add significant complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Final Integration and Testing task into subtasks covering: 1) Component integration and flow testing, 2) Performance optimization, 3) Responsive design verification, 4) Cross-browser compatibility testing, 5) Documentation and code cleanup
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a comprehensive task that ties together all previous work and requires extensive testing across browsers and devices. Performance optimization and ensuring all components work together seamlessly make this highly complex.
